actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for a $300 payment to an owner of a pre-1968 motor vehicle who has the vehicle scrapped.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to pay $300 to an owner of a motor vehicle manufactured before model year 1968 who has such vehicle scrapped.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a $300 payment to an owner of a pre-1968 motor vehicle who has the vehicle scrapped.
